message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob.  I believe this split reflects the fact that I'll be losing value faster with each round.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split while acknowledging the time pressure we both face.
Bob, I understand you want a balanced split, but time is against me more than it is against you.  This is my final offer.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's the best you'll get considering the rapid devaluation we're both facing.
